job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are seeking a End-to-end Engineer to design, build, and deploy cutting-edge solutions for a client in the financial sector.

   As a End-to-end Engineer, you will collaborate with internal teams and clients to develop innovative solutions. You will be responsible for end-to-end solution delivery, from design to deployment, ensuring they meet high standards of quality and cost-effectiveness.

   Your Responsibilities:
     * Work directly with stakeholders to understand processes and system requirements.
     * Design and implement responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions.
     * Develop reusable components from the solutions you create.
     * Collaborate with team members through pair-programming to tackle critical challenges.

   Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable.
     * Continuously automate processes and workflows to enhance productivity and scalability.
     * Share knowledge and collaborate with peers and stakeholders to improve solutions and practices across the board.
job_details.full_text:
End-to-end Engineer

We are seeking a End-to-end Engineer to design, build, and deploy cutting-edge solutions for a client in the financial sector.

   As a End-to-end Engineer, you will collaborate with internal teams and clients to develop innovative solutions. You will be responsible for end-to-end solution delivery, from design to deployment, ensuring they meet high standards of quality and cost-effectiveness.

   Your Responsibilities:
     * Work directly with stakeholders to understand processes and system requirements.
     * Design and implement responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions.
     * Develop reusable components from the solutions you create.
     * Collaborate with team members through pair-programming to tackle critical challenges.

   Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable.
     * Continuously automate processes and workflows to enhance productivity and scalability.
     * Share knowledge and collaborate with peers and stakeholders to improve solutions and practices across the board.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes designing, building, and deploying GenAI solutions, including RAG and fine-tuning, which aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. The role also involves software development and MLOps for production-grade systems, further supporting this classification.

phrases: Work directly with stakeholders to understand processes and system requirements.
collaborate with internal teams and clients to develop innovative solutions.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand client needs, business processes, and translate them into technical requirements.

phrases: Design and implement responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions.
Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly refer to the creation and implementation of Generative AI models and solutions.

phrases: Develop reusable components from the solutions you create.
build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need to build, integrate, and ensure the robustness and maintainability of the developed solutions, which are core software development activities.

phrases: Continuously automate processes and workflows to enhance productivity and scalability.
job_tasks.justification: The mention of deployment, running solutions in production, and automating processes points to MLOps responsibilities.
